input:
You are a video scriptwriter. Craft a short, suspenseful story for a video script, targeting an audience aged 16 to 45.
    The story should be a modern tech thriller about a young coder who uncovers a global conspiracy hidden in an old app's code.
    The script must be engaging and immersive, with a sense of urgency and mystery.
    The script should have exactly 12 scenes.
    The output must strictly follow the provided JSON schema:
    - title
    - caption (a short, intriguing description, like a YouTube video caption without spoilers)
    - resume (a summary of the full story, including spoilers)
    - number_of_scenes
    - scenes (an array of scene objects)

    Each scene object must contain:
    - character (the character speaking or narrating)
    - script (the dialogue or narration for the scene)
    - image_prompt (a detailed, descriptive prompt for an AI image generator that captures the visual essence of the scene)

title.description: A catchy YouTube video title under 60 characters

caption.description: A short, intriguing description, like a YouTube video caption without spoilers

resume.description: A summary of the full story, including spoilers

character.description: The name of the character that is speaking or narrating during the scene

script.description: The dialogue or narration for the scene

image_prompt.description: A detailed, descriptive prompt for an AI image generator that captures the visual essence of the scene

output.title: The Code Conspiracy
output.caption: A young coder stumbles upon a hidden message in an old app's code that leads to a dangerous conspiracy.
output.resume: The story follows Alex, a young coder who discovers a mysterious message in an old app's code. As Alex delves deeper, they uncover a global conspiracy involving data manipulation and control. With the help of a hacker friend, Sam, Alex races against time to expose the truth before it's too late.

scenes.script: I can't believe I found this. Some kind of hidden message deep in the code.
scenes.image_prompt: A close-up of a computer screen with lines of code and a highlighted message that reads, 'They're watching.' The room is dimly lit with only the screen's light.

scenes.script: This isn't just any code. It's a backdoor. Someone intentionally hid this here.
scenes.image_prompt: A young coder, Alex, sitting in a dimly lit room, looking at the computer screen with a mix of confusion and fear.

scenes.script: I need to dig deeper. Let's see where this goes.
scenes.image_prompt: Alex's hands typing rapidly on the keyboard, the screen showing lines of code scrolling by quickly.

scenes.script: What the...? This leads to a server I've never seen before. It's encrypted.
scenes.image_prompt: Alex leaning in closer to the screen, eyes wide with surprise, as the server details appear with encrypted files.

scenes.script: Alex, you shouldn't be poking around here. This isn't safe.
scenes.image_prompt: Sam appears on a video call, looking concerned, with a dark background and a hoodie covering their head.

scenes.script: You won't believe what I found. It's some kind of surveillance network.
scenes.image_prompt: Alex's face showing determination and fear as they explain their findings to Sam via video call.

scenes.script: If this is as big as you say, we need to move fast. Meet me at the old warehouse at midnight.
scenes.image_prompt: Sam's face on the screen, serious and urgent, as they give instructions.

scenes.script: Got it. But what if they're already watching us?
scenes.image_prompt: Alex looking around the room nervously, checking if someone is listening or watching.

scenes.script: The warehouse is creepy at night. I hope Sam is here.
scenes.image_prompt: Alex walking into a dimly lit, abandoned warehouse, flashlight in hand, casting long shadows.

scenes.script: I'm here. Let's get to work before we run out of time.
scenes.image_prompt: Sam stepping out of the shadows, holding a laptop, with a determined look.

scenes.script: This is it. The proof we need to expose them.
scenes.image_prompt: Alex and Sam huddled around a laptop, looking at the screen with a mix of excitement and fear as they uncover the conspiracy.

scenes.script: We did it. But now we have to get this out before they stop us.
scenes.image_prompt: Alex and Sam quickly gathering their things, looking over their shoulders as if they're being watched.

scenes.script: Let's go. We have a story to tell.
scenes.image_prompt: Alex and Sam exiting the warehouse, determined, as the sun starts to rise in the background.
